content: kirby 33rd anniversary special part 3 this magolor is just like my last one but a little larger put beside the smaller one for scale of course you can make it like the normal magolor or the shopkeeper one he looks as if he just got scorched by fiery puffer which i will explain in the pdf if you do it please show me how this fiery feat went for you in the projects tab and your magolor is no longer suitable to play with as a toy here are the materials you will need for this project worsted weight 4 medium in the following colors -brown -gray -light gray felt in the following colors -yellow -white i used crochet hook size f-3 75mm the finished product is approximately 20cm including the ears this pattern uses less than one skein of each color thankfully i was able to finish this before kirby week ended let me know if you have any concerns questions or comments about this pattern
